title: NAACP Image Awards: Fight Night, Cross and Percy Jackson Star Among First Two Waves of Winners
description: The first two waves of winners for the 56th NAACP Image Awards have been announced, and Peacock‚Äôs Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist, Disney+‚Äôs Percy Jackson and the Olympians and Prime Video‚Äôs Cross were among the shows honored. Heading into this year‚Äôs awards, Ayo Edebiri was the most-nominated TV performer with four total nominations ‚Äî [‚Ä¶]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
excerpt: The first wave of winners for the 56th NAACP Image Awards have been announced. See which TV shows and stars claimed prizes.
text: The first two waves of winners for the 56th NAACP Image Awards have been announced, and Peacock‚Äôs Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist, Disney+‚Äôs Percy Jackson and the Olympians and Prime Video‚Äôs Cross were among the shows honored. Heading into this year‚Äôs awards, Ayo Edebiri was the most-nominated TV performer with four total nominations ‚Äî three for her work on FX‚Äôs The Bear, and another for her memorable hosting debut on NBC‚Äôs Saturday Night Live. On Tuesday, she converted on one of those opportunities when she was named Outstanding Breakthrough Creative (Television). The most-nominated TV series overall this year is ABC‚Äôs Abbott Elementary with 10 nods, including for stars Quinta Brunson, Janelle James, Tyler James Williams, William Stanford Davis and Sheryl Lee Ralph. The NAACP Image Awards ‚Äî which celebrate the accomplishments of people of color in the fields of television, music, literature and film ‚Äî will air live on CBS and BET this Saturday, Feb. 22 at 8/7c. Review the first two waves of winners below (in bold and marked üèÜ), and share your thoughts! html:
The first two waves of winners for the 56th NAACP Image Awards have been announced, and Peacock‚Äôs Fight Night: The Million Dollar Heist, Disney+‚Äôs Percy Jackson and the Olympians and Prime Video‚Äôs Cross were among the shows honored.

Heading into this year‚Äôs awards, Ayo Edebiri was the most-nominated TV performer with four total nominations ‚Äî three for her work on FX‚Äôs The Bear, and another for her memorable hosting debut on NBC‚Äôs Saturday Night Live. On Tuesday, she converted on one of those opportunities when she was named Outstanding Breakthrough Creative (Television).

The most-nominated TV series overall this year is ABC‚Äôs Abbott Elementary with 10 nods, including for stars Quinta Brunson, Janelle James, Tyler James Williams, William Stanford Davis and Sheryl Lee Ralph.

The NAACP Image Awards ‚Äî which celebrate the accomplishments of people of color in the fields of television, music, literature and film ‚Äî will air live on CBS and BET this Saturday, Feb. 22 at 8/7c.

Review the first two waves of winners below (in bold and marked üèÜ), and share your thoughts!

OUTSTANDING COMEDY SERIES
Abbott Elementary (ABC)
